name: Sandeep Patharkar | www.FastTrackAiMastery.com
bio: AI and automation enthusiast with a strong background in building intelligent workflows. As an AWS Certified Solutions Architect, I design secure, scalable, cost-effective cloud solutions. Passionate about integrating AI to streamline processes and solve real-world challenges. Always eager to collaborate, share knowledge, and empower the community to push the boundaries of cloud and AI.
